experience: You and John both know Sean Sheppard, Dean Becker, and 10 others

The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN) is the world's leading multistakeholder organization, and one of the most significant technical coordination bodies for the Internet. ICANN is a not-for-profit public-benefit corporation with participants from all over the world dedicated to keeping the Internet secure, stable and interoperable. It promotes competition and develops policy on the Internet's unique identifiers.
Executive Vice President, Corporate Strategy & General Counsel

Between 1999 and 2003, Live365 (www.live365.com) grew from a start-up to become the world's largest Internet radio network, with an audience of more than 3 million listeners each month. Live365 is unique in that its programming is created by music fans; anyone with a computer and an Internet connection can create their own Internet radio station, resulting in a diverse array of high-quality streaming audio, with thousands of stations spanning myriad genres, broadcasting from over 100 countries.
Senior Counsel, Legal Affairs / Director, Business and Legal Affairs

The leading global real-world entertainment and media company.  Home of Discovery Channel, TLC, Animal Planet, Travel Channel, Discovery Digital Networks, and various Discovery branded media and entertainment companies around the world.
Vice President, Business Affairs and General Counsel
AND Interactive / TCI Interactive, a division of Telecommunications, Inc.

VP, Business Affairs and General Counsel for AND Interactive and TCI Interactive, divisions of Telcommunications, Inc. (TCI) - Early Innovator of broadband Internet and interactive television content and technology - producer, developer, production company and investment vehicle for Telecommunications, Inc. (TCI).  Developing initial broadband websites and making strategic deals for some of the earliest Internet content investments.

FX Television Networks / Fox Television / News Corporation - On launch team of FX cable television network for Fox Television and other News Corporation related endeavors. On Business and Legal Affairs team setting up FX cable network.  Among initial 25 people on board to build television network. Worked with Fox Television on affiliation, retransmission consent and strategic initiatives.
Paris Institute of International and Comparative Law, Paris, France

summary: Lawyer and business executive in a wide variety of emerging and established global businesses relating to technology, intellectual property, media and entertainment.  29 years of business, legal, strategic, and general management experience, with over 20 years experience as a General Counsel.Specialties: Board governance, legal team management, corporate governance, corporate secretary and board support services, media and entertainment business, technology business, corporate development, corporate compliance, litigation management and dispute resolution, development agreements, intellectual Property protections and matters (including intellectual property issues, data privacy, data breach crisis experience, licensing agreements, technology licensing, intellectual property portfolio management, distribution agreements, commercial transactions, legal affairs, business affairs, and non-profit industry experience.
